channel.title: 🏢 Case Western Reserve University on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Case Western Reserve University on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: bit2bit: 1-bit quanta video reconstruction via self-supervised photon prediction
item.description: bit2bit reconstructs high-quality videos from sparse, binary quanta image sensor data using self-supervised photon location prediction, significantly improving resolution and usability.
